scale_subtr: const to be subtracted from the SAMPLE scattering data
scale_mult: const, BACKGROUND data will be multiplied on
output_file_name: Can be left empty. In this case name will be [sample + suffix + _sub.dat]. If this name is given, the output file will be [name + suffix]
suffix: Can be left empty. If given, will be added to the output name file. If the [output_file_name] is empty, the name will be [sample + suffix + _sub.dat]
